neden hayır derseniz oyunda mikrofon ayarı yapınca benim kulaklığım bozuldu he singleplayer no prob ama multi de oynarken ses i kapatmak isterseniz sesiniz hepten kapanır discorddanda heryerden o yüzden oyunda multi yi önermiyorum yada oynarsanız tanıdıkla oynayın sesiniz gitsin ayar mayar yapmayın

Valve hizo una master class de cómo hacer un juego de puzzles con Portal y Portal 2, tiene los mejores puzzles que ví en su categoría, la historia es interesante y los personajes son memorables, todos tienen diálogos interesantes, reveladores acerca de la trama y muy divertidos e ingeniosos. Siento que no se puede describir qué tan bueno es el juego, sólo se puede entender experimentándolo. Una verdadera joyita.
если вы хотите играть в эту игру, вам надо обязательно поиграть в первую часть, а то вы не поймёте половины отсылок и сюжета
A true classic you cannot sexually identify as a gamer if you haven't played this
sıkıldıkça girip hikayesini baştan sona bitiriyorum. tam bir vakit öldürmelik oyun
i don't know how to deal with how i feel when glados talks
É um jogo tranquilo, para pensar e exercitar o cérebro. Ótimas imagens e movimentos.

Girls, don't ever play this game with your crush, because it will make him realize you are a bimbo who is only good at ''head game''.

I have no regrets though. You know.

Un jeu très agréable, avec des énigmes bien faites et variées et un humour omniprésent. Sans avoir jamais joué a un Portal, je dirais que j'ai pris environ 11 heures de jeu pour finir la campagne solo, qui est vraiment cool à jouer et qui vous fera vous creuser les méninges. 
La coop est sympa, je ne l'ai pas encore finie, mais c'est un plaisir de jouer à Portal avec un de ses potes, surtout pour troll !

Je recommande, mais attendez les soldes pour acheter le jeu à moins de 2€

我很幸运在当年接触游戏世界的初期就有如此优秀的游戏作为引路人。它太过优秀，以至于没有续作让我遗憾至今。期待续作的心情甚至在长远的时间之后让我悟出了一些道理：神作不常有，人短短的一生也许真的玩不到传送门系列的续作，好好享受现在吧。
（有的时候真的羡慕那些还没玩过它的玩家。）
剧情表现，氛围塑造，玩法，背景音乐，无可挑剔。经典的表达手段和极致的创新，我不知道我要堆上多少好词才能表达我内心的喜欢。
好玩 豆丝姐姐对我特别好 适合下班回家之后玩

Игра очень крутая, норм графика, присутствует ноуклип и god-мод, сюжет гораздо лучше чем в 1 части. Перепрошел игру раза 3, потом играл в карты от игроков, сам сделал парочку. Потом играли с другом, в общем игра понравилась, советую.

Ok this game is one  of the best sequels I've played so play it uses everything thing from the first game and improves it and adds new things that are fun as heck. The story is one of the best parts and it leads to an ending I wouldn't dare spoil. It adds the best character in the series Cave Johnson. So play this game
好是好，就是智力跟不上

Ah, yes,
buy it

A classic and still holds up to this day, this game is a very good introductory to gaming in general.

Fun and interesting storytelling and the audio itself gets a 10/10

simply the best puzzle game ever made. if you l like scifi, witty banter and flying through the air at high speed you will like this game. also playing with friends is a big plus for replay-ability. 

will be showing this one to my kids

Portal 2 Is The Best Sequel To Portal Still Alive!!!!

Fun puzzles and interesting story line. 11/10
终于玩完了，传送门真好玩，全程没有看攻略，蛮有成就感。故事很紧凑，逃生的那段bgm真的搞得我好紧张，优惠7元入手，绝对不亏。
'게임이 예술이 될 수 있는가?' 에 대한 완벽한 대답
Lots of hours of enjoyment spent on the level editor
This is a must have for anyone using Steam. Funny, engaging, and challenging singleplayer campaign. Also very fun to run through the multiplayer with a friend.
I LOVE this game so much! The story, the humor and the characters. IT'S GREAT GET IT. But now I much wait for 15 years for Portal 3.
Great story, especially if you played the first one. but where this game really thrives is in the co op campaign. the dialogue is hilarious, and it even has a good story. good fun to train your mind

El portal 2 es muy bueno, por su historia que es buena, su modo cooperativo que tambien es bueno y por lo que lo caracteriza mas que son sus puzzles, ¿Que si no te gustan los puzzles de la campaña y los del modo cooperativo? pues tranquilo porque en la workshop hay mas de 775,937 camaras de pruebas para probar hechas por la comunidad. Asi que si te gustan los juegos de puzzles con historia y que puedes jugar con amigos, este es tu juego. ¡Lo recomiendo!
100% worth it. Wait for a sale and get the deal that has both portal 1 and 2 for 3 bucks.
Fun until you beat all the levels.

This may be one of the BEST GAMES I HAVE EVER PLAYED! My playtime is very high on this game mainly because of how creative the story-line, concept, and everything else about the game is! I have been getting back into this game recently and have been using the editor a lot, although it is kinda limited, but you can just use BEEMOD2. This should be on Steam Awards! 10/10

O jogo é muito bom, mas diria que a qualidade diminui no capítulo 5-7, não gostei desses. Mas o capítulo 8 e 9 são muito bons, e essa porra desse robô burro pra caralho me tiraram boas risadas, compre o jogo, é muito bom.
im not that smart to begin with, but this game killed the last couple brain cells i had. if yew wunt 2 be stoopid liek mee buy and becum dum
i love the game play. the atmosphere is amazing and i would rate 10/10 would play agin
Look at how many hours on record I have. How would I be able to play this for so long if it wasn't incredible?
Still up there at the top for Best Writing, Best Pacing, Best Voice Acting, Best Character animation, best use of engine limitations.... I love this game.

Best co-op game ever.  Ever.  Best thing are the test chambers - imaginative new puzzle challenges that make it possible to play on and on.  Tried other co-op games, but nothing compares to Portal 2.  Absolutely love it.
